author: tgannon
title: Manchester City’s Gabriel Jesus welcomed with open arms as he trains for the first time ahead of potential debut against Tottenham
text:
EFL Embracing Jesus Manchester City’s Gabriel Jesus welcomed with open arms as he trains for the first time ahead of potential debut against Tottenham 
New Etihad starlet was also fired up by boss Pep Guardiola after being cleared by the FA to star in the Premier League Pictured
